mapper.select: select * from (select row_number() over(partition by boardType order by boardNo desc) as rn, b.*from (select board_no as boardNo, member_no as memberNo, board_title as boardTitle, board_content as boardContent, board_count as boardCount, board_date as boardDate, board_type as boardType, board_category as boardCategory, nickname as nickName from board join members using(member_no)order by board_no desc)b) where rn between #{start} and #{end} and boardType='F'

select count(*) from board
where board_type='F'
select count(*) from board where board_type=#{_parameter}

select board_no as boardNo, member_no as memberNo, board_title as boardTitle, board_count as boardCount, board_date as boardDate, board_type as boardType, board_content as boardContent, board_category as boardCategory, nickname as nickName from board join members using(member_no) where board_no = #{_parameter}
select file_no as fileNo, board_no as boardNo, filename, filepath from board_file where board_no = #{_parameter}

select board_comm_no as boardCommNo, member_no as memberNo, board_comm_content as boardCommContent, board_comm_date as boardCommDate, board_ref as boardRef, board_comm_ref as boardCommRef, nickname as nickName from board_comment join members using(member_no) where board_ref = #{_parameter} and board_comm_ref is null order by 1

select board_comm_no as boardCommNo, member_no as memberNo, board_comm_content as boardCommContent, board_comm_date as boardCommDate, board_ref as boardRef, board_comm_ref as boardCommRef, nickname as nickName from board_comment join members using(member_no) where board_ref = #{_parameter} and board_comm_ref is not null order by 1
mapper.update: update board_comment set board_comm_content = #{boardCommContent} where board_comm_no = #{boardCommNo}
